wikipedia_page.main: Squadron Leader Alexander Campbell Shirreff (12 February 1919 – 16 December 2006), known as Alan Shirreff, was an English pilot who served in the Royal Air Force during the after the Second World War. Shirreff was also an amateur cricketer who played first-class cricket either side of the Second World War. He played as an all-rounder, taking over 300 wickets with his medium pace deliveries.
